Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Scroll = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid local vPlayer
local scrollSound
local scrollSummon
Tool.Enabled = true
local checkWeld
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local pierceDamage = 30
local storeWeld = Tool:FindFirstChild("FireWeld") while storeWeld == nil do wait() storeWeld = Scroll:FindFirstChild("FireWeld") end
local waves = {}
local wave = Instance.new("Part") wave.FormFactor = 3 wave.Shape = "Block" wave.Size = Vector3.new(1, 3, 6) wave.CanCollide = false wave.Name = "Wave" wave.Transparency = 0.0
local waveMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") waveMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=60886166" waveMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=60886211" waveMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.35, 0.35, 0.35) waveMesh.Parent = wave
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil then creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Parent = humanoid creatorTag.Value = player debris:AddItem(creatorTag, 1.5) end end
function pierce(wave, hit) if wave then if hit.Parent and hit then if hit.className == "Hat" then humanoid = hit.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") else humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end if humanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= humanoid and myHumanoid ~= nil then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(pierceDamage) end end end end
function summon() scrollSummon = Tool:FindFirstChild("ScrollSummon") vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if scrollSummon and myTorso and myHumanoid then if scrollSummon.Value == 1 then wait(2.0) coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() wait(3.0) scrollSummon = Tool:FindFirstChild("ScrollSummon") if scrollSummon then scrollSummon.Value = 0 end end)) myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 0.0 myTorso.Anchored = true for i = 1, 10 do local direction = CFrame.Angles(0, i * math.pi/5, 0) * myTorso.CFrame.lookVector local spawnPos = myTorso.Position + direction * 4.0 waves[i] = wave:Clone() waves[i].CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + direction) waves[i].Velocity = direction * 55.0
local floatForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") floatForce.force = Vector3.new(0, waves[i]:GetMass() * 196.1, 0) floatForce.Parent = waves[i]
waves[i].Parent = game.Workspace
waves[i].Touched:connect(function(hit) pierce(waves[i], hit) end) debris:AddItem(waves[i], 2) end wait(1.0) myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 22.0 coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() wait(3.0) if myHumanoid then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end end)) myTorso.Anchored = false end end end
function onEquipped() checkWeld = Scroll:FindFirstChild("FireWeld") if checkWeld == nil then checkWeld = storeWeld:Clone() checkWeld.Parent = Scroll end vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) end
function onUnequipped() if scrollSound then scrollSound:Stop() end if myHumanoid then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end end
Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped)
while Tool:FindFirstChild("ScrollSummon") == nil do wait() end scrollSummon = Tool:FindFirstChild("ScrollSummon") if scrollSummon then scrollSummon.Changed:connect(summon) end

local Tool = script.Parent local Scroll = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid
local scrollAnim
Tool.Enabled = true
local scrollSummon
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid == nil then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
scrollSummon = Tool:FindFirstChild("ScrollSummon") if scrollSummon then if scrollSummon.Value == 1 then return else scrollSummon.Value = 1 end end
scrollAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.ScrollAnim) if scrollAnim then scrollAnim:Play() end
Scroll.Transparency = 1.0
wait(5.0) Scroll.Transparency = 0.0 Tool.Enabled = true end
function onUnequipped() if scrollAnim then scrollAnim:Stop() end Scroll.Transparency = 0.0 end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
